alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 7:26PM EDT until July 13 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lamoille County in northwestern Vermont... North central Orange County in central Vermont... Caledonia County in northeastern Vermont... Southern Orleans County in northeastern Vermont... Southern Essex County in northeastern Vermont... Central Washington County in central Vermont... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 726 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hardwick Center to Northfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Barre, St. Johnsbury, Lyndon, Montpelier, Calais, Burke, Brunswick, Greensboro Bend, Worcester, Middlesex, Marshfield, Cabot Village, West Burke Village, Ferdinand, Granby, Woodbury, Cabot, Kirby, E F Knapp State Airport, and Maidstone. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Essex; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington
